data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added copyTextToClipboard for QML rviz context property.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Fixed overlay disappearing when origin not in view but reintroduced bug that it is rendered on top of Camera Display.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message:
Updated texture overlay renderer to use scene node instead of OGRE overlay.
This should fix the overlay also being rendered on top of Camera displays.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message:
Added getters to obtain node name and namespace from rviz context property in QML.
Accessible as `rviz.namespace` and `rviz.nodeName`.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added libglew-dev dependency which is missing in rviz_ogre_vendor.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added rviz_ogre_vendor dependency.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Updated filesystem watcher to drop boost dependency and handle symlinks.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Removed GLEW dependency.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Fixed conversion of rviz GL version to Qt version format.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Clang formatted.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Fixed dependency export of Qt5 for users of this target.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Fixed crash on rviz exit due to toolsRemoved signal being queued and outliving tool manager.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Changed build tool to ament_cmake.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Fixed current tool not selected when adding tools overlay.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Jazzy port.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added qml getter + setter for fixedFrame in rviz context.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added missing build depends.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Changed getTool to use class id instead of name.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added getTool by name method to qml tool manager.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Fixed incorrect loading of properties.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Fixed crash in QML RViz context when RViz is used as QWidget and the WindowManagerInterface is not provided.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added support to query and change fullscreen state of rviz.

data.author: Alexander Stumpf
data.message: Add getter to root item of qml overlay.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added getter for QQmlEngine from QmlOverlay.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Updated package.xml

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Added missing dependencies.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Also pass the changed value in signal on property changed.

data.author: Stefan Fabian
data.message: Initial release.
